chapter.title: Packaging &LIBGDA; UI extension
chapter.para: &LIBGDA; UI extension builds on top of &LIBGDA; and GTK+ to provide some graphical widgets, a control center (to manage DSN and list installed providers) and a browser program to analyze the contents of a database.

sect1.title: Overview of the components
sect1.para:
&LIBGDA; UI's components are:
the runtime files (shared library)
the tools, which require the runtime component
the development files (the includes to compile C programs)

Please note:
the documentation and localization files are mixed with &LIBGDA;'s ones
the tools have been described here as a separate component but it is highly recomended to bundle the tools with the runtime as they provide essential tools to the end user.

sect1.title: Runtime component
sect1.para:
This component is the base component for Libgda UI, required by any application which uses &LIBGDA;' UI, extension, it contains the following files (located under the installation directory):
. |-- lib | |-- libgda-4.0 | | |-- plugins | | | |-- gdaui-entry-filesel-spec.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-password.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-pict-spec.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-pict-spec_string.xml | | | `-- libgdaui-plugins.so | |-- libgdaui-4.0.so -> libgdaui-4.0.so.4.1.0 | |-- libgdaui-4.0.so.4 -> libgdaui-4.0.so.4.1.0 | `-- libgdaui-4.0.so.4.1.0 `-- share `-- libgda-4.0 |-- server_operation.glade `-- ui |-- gdaui-entry-string-number.xml `-- gdaui-entry-string-string.xml
This component should be made dependent on the &LIBGDA;'s runtime component.

sect1.title: Development files
sect1.para:
The development files are the include files needed to compile C programs, the PKG-CONFIG .pc files, the static libraries and a demo program (like gtk-demo)
